hero.title: The Communication Protocol of Web3
hero.description: Push is a web3 native communication network, enabling cross-chain notifications, messaging, and more for apps, wallets, and services.

partners-section.partner-channels-description: Discover an amazing community of developers building with Push to engage users and increase adoption.
partners-section.networks: Push powers communication for over 100 of the world’s leading dapps and service providers across DeFi, NFTs, gaming, dev tools, and more. Push is currently live on Ethereum, Polygon and BNB Chain.
partners-section.alt-missing-web3-image: Illustration showing Push as the missing piece of web3
partners-section.title-missing-web3-image: Push is the missing piece of web3
partners-section.missing-web3-title: Push is the missing piece of Web3
partners-section.missing-web3-text: Until Push, no solution existed to enable native communication between wallets in response to on- and off-chain data. The result was a fractured dapp ecosystem, held together by antiquated and centralized communication platforms.
partners-section.missing-web3-span: Push is building the communication network for Web3, addressing a gap in critical infrastructure and improving the everyday experience for blockchain users.

email-section.title: Never Miss an Update
email-section.text: Sign up and stay up to date with ecosystem announcements, giveaways and more.

slide1.title: Push Notifications
slide1.text: directly connect applications to individual users, enabling secure and personalized communication in response to customized on- and off-chain activity.

slide2.title: Push Chat
slide2.text: is the leading decentralized, web3 native chat application with user friendly features like 1-1, group chat, videos/images, and (soon) streaming.

slide3.title: Push DAO
slide3.text: is the home of community ownership of the Push Protocol. Push token holders can view, propose, and vote on critical developments to the protocol.

header.main-text: Push provides a robust and decentralized push notification protocol.
header.other-text: Push enables web3 native notification alerts between wallets.

box1.title: Web3 Native
box1.imagealt: Illustration showing native web3 notification support for smart contracts, gasless and even off-chain notifications
box1.imagetitle: Supports any type of web3 native notification capabilities

box2.title:
Cross-chain 
Notifications
box2.imagealt: Illustration showing cross-chain support for Push Protocol
box2.imagetitle: Supports cross-chain notifications including EVM and non-EVM chains (Like Polygon, BNB, etc)

box3.title:
Customize Notification 
Preferences
box3.imagealt: Illustration showing various types of notification categories that can be customized by the developer for enchaned UX
box3.imagetitle: Supports customizable notification categories for enhanced user experience

box4.title: Lightweight Code with Rapid API Integration
box4.imagealt: Illustration showing lines of code required for Push Protocol integration
box4.imagetitle: Integrate Push Protocol in less than 4 minutes and 2 lines of code
box4.buttontitle: Documentation for instant integration of notifications via Push Protocol in your dapp.

box5.title:
Interoperable 
Notifications
box5.bgtitle: Interoperable notifications across all web3 wallets and dapps (Like Unstoppable, MetaMask Push Snap, Shapeshift, Push, etc)

box6.title: Anti-Spam
box6.iconalt: Illustration showing anti-spam capabilities of Push Protocol
box6.icontitle: User centric, anti-spam capabilities to thwart spam and unwanted notifications.

box7.title: Push Snap
box7.imagetitle: Illustration showing Push Snap for MetaMask users
box7.imagealt: Push Snap to ensure users of MetaMask can get notifications without any additional setup.

box8.title:
Increase 
Engagement
box8.imagealt: Illustration showing graph indicating increased user engagement (by 8x) with Push Protocol

header.main-text: Push Chat is the leading decentralized,
header.other-text: web3 native chat protocol with user friendly features like group chat, video calls, spaces and streaming

box1.title:
Share Images, Gifs, 
and Reactions
box1.imagealt: Illustration showing messages sent in a group chat along with a meme
box1.imagetitle: Send emojis, gifs, and images in group chat, gated by web3 native preferences

box2.title: Chat Requests
box2.iconalt: Illustration showing 5 chat requests in Push Chat
box2.icontitle: User centric, anti-spam capabilities to thwart spam and unwanted chat / scam chats.

box4.title: Lightweight Code with Rapid API Integration
box4.imagealt: Illustration showing 2 lines of code required for Push Protocol integration
box4.imagetitle: Integrate Push Chat in 2 mins and with 2 lines of code
box4.buttontitle: Explore the documentation for instant integration of chat via Push Protocol in your dapp

box5.title:
Hyperscalable 
Groups
box5.bgtitle: Push Chat supports groups that can have 100k+ members, a feat that is not possible with any other chat app in the web3 ecosystem.

box6.title:
Plug and Play 
Chat Components
box6.imagealt: Illustration showing how different components of Push Chat can be seamlessly integrated into any dapp
box6.imagetitle: Seamlessly integrate Push Chat or any of the modular components into your dapp in minutes

box7.title: Chain Agnostic
box7.iconalt: Illustration showing Push Chat supporting all EVM and even non-EVM chains
box7.icontitle: Push Chat is chain agnostic and simply works on any EVM (with non-EVM support coming soon)

box8.imagealt: Illustration showing a bored ape nft and how it or any other NFT, tokens or any conditional logic can be used to create gated groups
box8.imagetitle: Create gated groups based on NFTs, tokens or any conditional logic!
box8.footertext:
Create Token, NFT, 
Geo Gated Groups

box9.title: E2E Encryption
box9.iconalt: Illustration showing E2E encryption in Push Chat
box9.icontitle: End to end encryption (E2EE) for all messages and calls between users of Push

box10.title:
Supports any 
Web3 Standard
box10.imagealt: Illustration showing how all web3 standards can be used in Push Chat including chatting with wallet, NFTs, cross chain messaging, etc
box10.imagetitle: Chat from a wallet or an NFT or even between different chains, Push Chat supports all web3 standards

video-section.alt: Illustration showing real-time Web3 communication with Push Video
video-section.title: Push Video
video-section.subtitle: Experience real time web3 communication with Push Video
video-section.content: Push Video supports decentralized wallet-to-wallet video calls in a chain-agnostic environment.

space-section.alt: Illustration showing real-time Web3 communication with Push Spaces
space-section.title: Push Spaces
space-section.subtitle: Revolutionize web3 communication with community streaming
space-section.content: The first web3 decentralized audio streaming app, powered by Push Protocol.

grow-section.image-title: Use the Push token to grow
grow-section.title: Grow with Push
grow-section.text: The $PUSH token enables governance, modification of protocol fees and features, network security, and fee management among all wallets that integrate Push, including Push governance participants.

why-push-section.title: Why do you need Push?
why-push-section.text: Before Push, blockchain applications, service providers, and wallets had no way to natively communicate with each other. Most communication in today’s ecosystem relies on traditional web2 solutions, resulting in a broken ecosystem and problems in daily use.

investors-section.title: Backed by successful entrepreneurs and venture capital funds.

network-section.title: Learn how Push Network becomes L2 for web3 communication!
network-section.third-text: Stake Push for API Calls to the Network

article1.text: We saw a driven, innovative builder who was deeply committed to Ethereum's growth and success.

article2.text: The company hopes to address the lack of cross-blockchain communication with easy messaging tools.

article3.text: Push Protocol is the “Missing piece of Web3” that is required to bring the UX of Web2 to Web3.

article4.text: Decentralized push notifications may transform what dapps can do.

article5.text: Web3 communication networks and decentralized teams go together like peanut butter and jelly.

article6.text: Unstoppable Domains launches badge-gated group chat feature for username holders powered by Push Chat.

article7.text: Collaboration with Push Protocol aims to fend off misinformation and scams.

article8.text: Push Protocol, recently completed Phase 1 of its (BRB) dev tour in India. A hackathon participant successfully solved a challenge brought forth by our team: Quantum Proofing Ethereum accounts.

bg-section.title: Take your user engagement to the next level.
bg-section.subtitle: Engage users, build communities, and enable a thriving ecosystem with Push.
